metadata.description: Prospectus for J. de Sales' "Histoire de l'Empire assyrien"
"Deux vol. in-8°, prix, broché, 10 livres. Ou 2 vol. in-12, prix, broché, 5 livres. A Paris, chez Hardouin, libraire, rue des Prêtres Saint-Germain-l'Auxerrois"--P. [1]
Includes advertisement for six other titles sold by Hardouin
metadata.notes: Damaged, torn, stained and/or loose pages. Uneven binding. Skewed text. Irregular pagination. Title page and cover are combined.
